exm.mng: Ji Xianlin (1911-2009), Chinese linguist and Indologist
see 臨淵羨魚，不如退而結網|临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网[lin2 yuan1 xian4 yu2 , bu4 ru2 tui4 er2 jie2 wang3]

exm.cur: 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网
exm.trd: 臨淵羨魚，不如退而結網
exm.mng: better to return home and weave a net than stand by water and desire the fishes (idiom), one should take practical steps to achieve one’s aims, it is vain to fish without a hook, or read without a book
exm.pyn: lín yuān xiàn yú , bù rú tuì ér jié wǎng

exm.cur: 临渊羡鱼不如退而结网
exm.trd: 臨淵羨魚不如退而結網
exm.mng: rather than admiring fish, go home and weave a net
exm.pyn: lín yuān xiàn yú bù rú tuì ér jié wǎng
